headline: S&P Inclusion Adds to the Excitement Around Comfort Systems (FIX) stock
summary: Comfort Systems (NYSE:FIX) is one of the 10 Data Center Cooling Companies to Invest In . On December 5, Comfort Systems was selected to become a part of the S&P 500 index. The news came after the quarterly rebalancing of the index, meaning FIX will now be included in the S&P 500 index before the […]
